product_name: Tretorn Strala Rain Boots - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Practical and protective, the low-profile Tretorn Strala rain boots boast waterproof construction and cozy linings for versatile winter wear. Rubber uppers form a tough waterproof barrier; low-cut design works great with long pants. Dual elastic side gores and nylon pull tab at top of boots allow easy on-and-off; reflective detail at back enhances visibility in low light. Polyester microfleece linings are soft to the touch, wick moisture to regulate foot temperature and insulate in cold weather. Rubber midsoles deliver plenty of cushioning for all-day comfort and support. Outsoles on the Tretorn Strala rain boots supply sure footing on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Practical and protective, the low-profile Tretorn Strala rain boots boast waterproof construction and cozy linings for versatile winter wear.
